place

Class Place

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • place.Place
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Forest, Room

    public abstract class Place
extends Observable
    Models a Place in a world. Actors and items may be located in a room.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Dallow
    See Also:
    Thing, Actor
